Plot: An emotive journey of a former school teacher, who writes letters for illiterate people, and a young boy, whose mother has just died, as they search for the father he never knew.
Title: Central Station
Writer: Marcos Bernstein, João Emanuel Carneiro, Walter Salles (story)
Actors: Fernanda Montenegro, Marília Pêra, Vinícius de Oliveira, Soia Lira
tomatoConsensus: Director Salles transcends road-movie clichés and crafts a film that is as moving as it is universal.
Awards: Nominated for 2 Oscars. Another 36 wins & 21 nominations.
